sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link, Routes, Route, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import axios from 'axios'; import BranchOrders from './BranchOrders'; import BranchProducts from './BranchProducts'; import BranchRecycleBin from './BranchRecycleBin'; import BranchDrivers from './BranchDrivers'; function BranchManager() { const [branchId] = useState('BRANCH001'); // This would come from authentication const [branchName] = useState('Main Branch'); const [statistics, setStatistics] = useState({ orders: { total: 0, pending: 0, processing: 0, delivered: 0 }, inventory: { totalItems: 0, lowStock: 0, outOfStock: 0 }, recycling: { totalBins: 0, criticalBins: 0, overallFill: 0 } }); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); useEffect(() => { fetchDashboardData(); }, []); const fetchDashboardData = async () => { try { setLoading(true); // Fetch order statistics const orderStats = await axios.get(`http://localhost:5000/BranchOrders/statistics/${branchId}`); // Fetch inventory statistics const inventoryStats = await axios.get(`http://localhost:5000/BranchInventory/statistics/${branchId}`); // Fetch recycling statistics const recyclingStats = await axios.get(`http://localhost:5000/RecyclingBins/statistics/${branchId}`); setStatistics({ orders: orderStats.data.statistics, inventory: inventoryStats.data.statistics, recycling: recyclingStats.data.statistics }); } catch (error) { console.error('Error fetching dashboard data:', error); } finally { setLoading(false); } }; const getStatusColor = (percentage) => { if (percentage >= 80) return 'text-red-600'; if (percentage >= 60) return 'text-orange-600'; if (percentage >= 40) return 'text-yellow-600'; return 'text-green-600'; }; if (loading) { return (
); } return (
{/* Header */}

Branch Manager

{branchName}

Branch ID

{branchId}

BM
{/* Navigation */}
Dashboard Orders Products Recycle Bin Drivers
{/* Main Content */}
} /> } /> } /> } /> } />
); } // Dashboard Component function Dashboard({ statistics, getStatusColor }) { return (

Dashboard Overview

{/* Statistics Cards */}
{/* Orders Card */}

Total Orders

{statistics.orders.totalOrders}

Pending

{statistics.orders.pendingOrders}

Processing

{statistics.orders.processingOrders}

Delivered

{statistics.orders.deliveredOrders}

{/* Inventory Card */}

Inventory Items

{statistics.inventory.totalItems}

Low Stock

{statistics.inventory.lowStockItems}

Out of Stock

{statistics.inventory.outOfStockItems}

{/* Recycling Card */}

Recycling Bins

{statistics.recycling.totalBins}

Critical

{statistics.recycling.criticalBins}

Fill Level

{statistics.recycling.overallFillPercentage.toFixed(1)}%

{/* Today's Orders Card */}

Today's Orders

{statistics.orders.todayOrders}

New orders placed today

{/* Quick Actions */}

Quick Actions

Create New Order

Request stock from factory

Manage Inventory

Update stock levels

Check Recycling

Monitor bin levels

); } export default BranchManager;
